generator.group: Centre for Ophthalmology and Visual Science, The University of Western Australia

contact.group: Centre for Ophthalmology and Visual Science, The University of Western Australia

publications.title: Generation of three induced pluripotent stem cell lines from an isolated inherited retinal dystrophy patient with RCBTB1 frameshifting mutations

donor.disease_description: Inherited retinal dystrophy caused by compound heterozygous RCBTB1 mutations

genomic_modifications.description: Compound heterozygous c.1706delG and c.707delA frameshift mutations in RCBTB1

genomic_characterisation.summary: Digital karyotyping demonstrated normal diploid karyotype at 300,000 SNPs (Illumina HumanCytoSNP-12 Beadchip, 1.0 Mb resolution).

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal iPSC Reprogramming Plasmid kit (SC900A-1, System Biosciences)

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
